did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: U.S. Department of Labor Office of American Workplace Labor Management Cooperation Collected Publications, Part 2
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Due to the number of publications in this collection the finding aid for it has been split into two.
The publications in Boxes 1 through 22 are listed in the container list of Part 1.
The publications in Boxes 23 through 27 are listed in the container list of this finding aid (Part 2).

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United States. Dept. of Labor. Office of American Workplace Labor Management Cooperation --Archives

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: U.S. Department of Labor Office of American Workplace Labor Management Cooperation Collected Publications #6007. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
